channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Right turn arrow not activating, 11th August
item.description:
There is a right turn arrow light that is not activating. This means that there is often a lot of traffic queuing in the right lane, but as the cycle never gives them priority against oncoming traffic, only one or two cars can get through at a time. This means there is often a long queue of cars in the right turn lane that blocks the traffic trying to go straight ahead too. I have seen this arrow turn on once or twice, shortly after the lights were turned on. But I've not seen it since, and certainly not when it's busy. I'd be grateful if this could be investigated, and if you could confirm if this is the intended behaviour or not. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 159, Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: The speed warning sign on Old Bath Road is not working., 11th August
item.description:
The speed warning sign opposite the junction between Old Bath Road and Pilford Road which illuminates to alert drivers to adhere to 30 MPH is not working.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 347, Old Bath Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign isn't working correctly (part only or random activation)

item.title: Large paint spillage in middle of road, 11th August
item.description:
It appears that quite a large spillage of white paint has appeared outside number 32 Planets Lane and been in the middle of the road for the past week. It is an eyesore on the estate and making vehicles have to drive around it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32, Planets Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over grown landscapes, 11th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Phoenix Close, Brockworth, Gloucester

item.title: Pothole around drain and next to drain, 11th August
item.description:
Large pot holes around the drain. Causing driving to break and also move into middle of road to avoid when driving at speed. Be present for a long time, before the cycle words and increasing in size monthly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Elmbridge, Gloucester
